comments:
Build I20021210

In the customize key bindings preference page, there are two radio buttons in
the "Action" group.  If I open the preference page, *don't select a key
sequence*, but try to click on those radio buttons, they do not toggle.  Also an
IllegalArgumentException appears in the log:
